statements: SELECT * FROM MetagenomicData
SELECT sample_id, environment FROM MetagenomicData
SELECT microbial_species, abundance FROM MetagenomicData WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY abundance DESC
SELECT * FROM MetagenomicData WHERE environment = 'Ocean' OR environment = 'Forest'
SELECT sample_id, environment, microbial_species, abundance FROM MetagenomicData ORDER BY sample_id ASC
SELECT sample_id, environment, microbial_species, abundance FROM MetagenomicData WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY sample_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT environment, COUNT(DISTINCT microbial_species) AS species_count FROM MetagenomicData GROUP BY environment ORDER BY species_count DESC
SELECT sample_id, environment, microbial_species, abundance FROM MetagenomicData WHERE microbial_species LIKE 'B%a%' ORDER BY environment
SELECT AVG(abundance) AS avg_abundance, MAX(abundance) AS max_abundance, MIN(abundance) AS min_abundance FROM MetagenomicData WHERE environment = 'Marine'
SELECT sample_id, environment, microbial_species, abundance FROM MetagenomicData WHERE abundance BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY environment ASC
SELECT * FROM sample_data;
SELECT sample_id, microbial_species FROM sample_data WHERE abundance_percent > 50;
SELECT environment_name, temperature, humidity FROM environment_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sample_id, abundance_percent FROM sample_data ORDER BY abundance_percent DESC;
SELECT sample_id, microbial_species, abundance_percent FROM sample_data JOIN environment_data ON sample_data.environment_id = environment_data.environment_id;
SELECT * FROM sample_data WHERE microbial_species = 'Bacteria'
SELECT sample_id, microbial_species, abundance_percent FROM sample_data WHERE abundance_percent > 0.5 ORDER BY abundance_percent DESC
SELECT sample_id, environment_name FROM sample_data JOIN environment_data ON sample_data.environment_id = environment_data.environment_id
SELECT environment_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM environment_data GROUP BY environment_id HAVING avg_temperature > 25
SELECT environment_id, environment_name, temperature, humidity FROM environment_data ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM MetagenomicSamples;
SELECT sample_name, environment FROM MetagenomicSamples WHERE collection_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM MicrobialSpecies JOIN CommunityAnalysis ON MicrobialSpecies.species_id = CommunityAnalysis.species_id;
SELECT species_name, genus, phylum FROM MicrobialSpecies WHERE genus = 'Bacillus';

SELECT sample_name, abundance, diversity_index FROM MetagenomicSamples JOIN CommunityAnalysis ON MetagenomicSamples.sample_id = CommunityAnalysis.sample_id WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY diversity_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM MetagenomicSamples;
SELECT sample_name, environment FROM MetagenomicSamples WHERE collection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT species_name, genus, phylum FROM MicrobialSpecies WHERE genus = 'Bacteria';
SELECT sample_name, abundance, diversity_index FROM MetagenomicSamples JOIN CommunityAnalysis ON MetagenomicSamples.sample_id = CommunityAnalysis.sample_id WHERE abundance > 0.5;

SELECT sample_name, species_name, abundance FROM MetagenomicSamples JOIN CommunityAnalysis ON MetagenomicSamples.sample_id = CommunityAnalysis.sample_id JOIN MicrobialSpecies ON CommunityAnalysis.species_id = MicrobialSpecies.species_id WHERE genus = 'Bacteria';
SELECT * FROM environment_samples;
SELECT sample_name, environment_type FROM environment_samples WHERE collection_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT species_name, abundance FROM microbial_species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT ssd.sample_id, m.species_name, ssd.relative_abundance FROM sample_species_data ssd JOIN microbial_species m ON ssd.species_id = m.species_id WHERE ssd.sample_id = 3;

SELECT ar.result_id, ar.analysis_date, ar.analysis_method, m.species_name FROM analysis_results ar JOIN sample_species_data ssd ON ar.data_id = ssd.data_id JOIN microbial_species m ON ssd.species_id = m.species_id ORDER BY ar.analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environment_samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_name, environment_type FROM environment_samples WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, species_type, abundance FROM microbial_species WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY abundance DESC;
SELECT * FROM sample_species_data JOIN microbial_species ON sample_species_data.species_id = microbial_species.species_id WHERE relative_abundance > 0.3;
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, analysis_method, result_description FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sample;
SELECT sample_name, location FROM Sample ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_function FROM Gene WHERE gene_function = 'coding';
SELECT * FROM Organism WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY organism_id ASC;
SELECT environment_name, temperature, pH FROM Environment;
SELECT * FROM Sample WHERE sample_name = 'Sample1';
SELECT sample_name, location FROM Sample WHERE location = 'Location1';
SELECT organism_name, organism_type, abundance FROM Organism WHERE abundance > 0.5 ORDER BY organism_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_function, sequence FROM Gene WHERE gene_function LIKE '%transcription%';
SELECT s.*, o.organism_name FROM Sample s INNER JOIN Organism o ON s.sample_id = o.organism_id;
